verses.name: Jeremiah 32:37
verses.text: Behold, I will gather them out of all countries, whither I have driven them in mine anger, and in my fury, and in great wrath; and I will bring them again unto this place, and I will cause them to dwell safely:

verses.name: Jeremiah 32:38
verses.text: And they shall be my people, and I will be their God:

verses.name: Jeremiah 32:39
verses.text: And I will give them one heart, and one way, that they may fear me for ever, for the good of them, and of their children after them:
